name: Volcanic Dragon: Molten Scourge
flavor: Engaged by their wounds, the dragon bursts into molten lava.

features.name: Relentless (3) - Passive
features.desc: Can be spotlighted up to three times per GM turn. Spend Fear as usual to spotlight them.

features.name: Cracked Scales - Passive
features.desc: When the Molten Scourge takes damage, roll a number of d6s equal to HP marked. For each result of 4 or higher, you gain a Fear.

features.name: Shattering Might - Action
features.desc: Mark a Stress to make an attack against a target within Very Close range. On a success, target takes 4d8+14 physical damage, loses a Hope, and is knocked back to Close range. The Scourge clears a Stress.

features.name: Eruption - Action
features.desc: Spend a Fear to erupt lava from beneath the Scourgeâ€™s scales, filling area within Very Close range with lava. All targets must make Agility Reaction Roll or take 4d6+6 physical damage and be knocked back to Close range. The area remains lava (6 HP damage on entry or action).

features.name: Volcanic Breath - Reaction
features.desc: When the Scourge takes Major damage, roll d10.
